title: Change to Chelsea WSL fixture against Brighton
body_text:
Change to Chelseas WSL fixture against Brighton
The kick-off time for our Womens Super League fixture away at Brighton and Hove Albion has been moved.
We will travel to the Broadfield Stadium in Crawley to face Brighton & Hove Albion in the WSL on Sunday 14 December, and the kick-off time has now been brought forward by five minutes to 11:55am.
Sky Sports will be broadcasting the match live and full ticket information for this fixture is available here.
You can see Chelsea take on Barcelona as one of womens footballs most exciting rivalries heads to Stamford Bridge on Thursday 20 November. Click here to buy tickets.
( Press Release Image: https://photos.webwire.com/prmedia/8/346706/346706-1.png )
